about_the_game:
SLING was a fun on-line video game that was hugely popular back in the 00s (The Ooze!)

The cartoony-hand-drawn styled game called upon you, as the player, to go on an adventure as a little slimey sling character who must save his world from destruction by slinging and flinging themselves through thrilling puzzles and bosses to retrieve and restore the Slime Power Element to the Oozeville Powersource!

The fun, pull-back-and-sling game mechanic was very unique and compelling. Players were guided through the quest by the eccentric but friendly Geeza - the Oozeville PowerKeeper, whose humour kept the challenging platform game charming and lighthearted.

It was popular enough to spawn two sequels! SLING FIRE, and SLING ICE. Both equally as entertaining and fun!

However, before more SLING games could be created – life imitated art — the game browser plugin was discontinued. Leaving the games broken. Sending SLING disappearing into obscurity!

However, if SLING receives enough interest, we will be able to restore and remaster SLING (And thus hopefully all SLING sequels).

So, please help spread the word, tell your friends, drop in to the discord and help bring SLING to Steam!

short_description: Sling is a 2D physics platformer with a twist. Get ready to fling, flick, snap, bounce, drop and shoot a springy ball of slime through 50 danger filled levels.
